import React,{ useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { ActivityPost } from '../../Countries_store/actions' export const CreateActivity = ()=>{ let $countries = useSelector((state)=>state.countries) let [act, setAct] = useState({ name:'', difficulty:1, duration:30, season:'', country:[] }) let handleChange = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() setAct((prev)=>({ ...prev, countries:[...e.target.value,act.countries], [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } let handleCountries = (e)=>{ if(act.country.includes(e.target.value)){ console.log('ya esta en el estado') }else{ setAct((prev)=>({ ...prev, country:[...act.country,e.target.value] })) } } let handleClickDelete = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(e.target.name) let arr = act.country.filter((el)=>el !== e.target.value) setAct((prev)=>({ ...prev, country:[...arr] })) } let handleSubmit = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() ActivityPost(act) alert('Activity created') } return( <>
Activity create











countries selectd
{act.country.map((el)=>)}



) }
